title: Measurement and Unit Conversions

vocab.definition: The process of finding the size, length, or amount of something
Changing from one unit of measurement to another
A system of measurement based on powers of 10
The measurement system commonly used in the United States
How exact or detailed a measurement is

teachingNotes: Practice with both metric and customary units. Use real-world examples and measuring tools. Emphasize the importance of including units in answers.

sample.question: What measurement system is based on powers of 10?

multiplechoice.question: How many centimeters are in 1 meter?

fillintheblank.question: Changing from one unit of measurement to another is called unit ________.

wordProblems.question: A recipe calls for 2.5 liters of water. How many milliliters is this?
